TestFrame.Name: ReadErrorRegister
TestFrame.TemplateText: .ReadErrorRegister Value&#013REPORT -- Check if ErrorRegister is 0 --&#013ETH PATHMUX PORTX TX PHY1&#013ETH PATHMUX PORTX RX PHY1&#013WAIT FOR ms 5&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATACLEAR&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0000 + 12 EE&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0001 + 12 00 --00 read&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0002 + 12 0E --Reg address 0x0038&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0003 + 12 00 --Reg address&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATA 0004 + 12 38 --Reg address&#013-- Frame params&#013ETH PORTX SENDDATALENGTH 60 &#013ETH PORTX SENDDATARAW FALSE &#013ETH PORTX SENDINTERFRAMEGAP 1000 &#013ETH PORTX SENDNROFFRAMES 1&#013-- Check Error&#013ETH PORTX CHECKDATACLEAR&#013ETH PORTX CHECKMASKCLEAR&#013ETH PORTX CHECKDATA 0012 EE&#013ETH PORTX CHECKDATA 0013 00 --&#013ETH PORTX CHECKDATA 0014 Value&#013-- Frame params&#013ETH PORTX CHECKDATALENGTH 60 &#013ETH PORTX CHECKDATARAW FALSE&#013ETH PORTX SEND START&#013ETH PORTX CHECK START&#013WAIT FOR ms 10&#013ETH PORTX SEND STOP&#013ETH PORTX CHECK STOP&#013WAIT FOR ms 5&#013ETH PORTX CHECKNROFFRAMES 1&#013.END
